name: save the princess
description:
Oh no, The princess has been kidnapped! Help our valiant Knight rescue the princess from the clutches of the demons in this enjoyable, but challenging, platformer game.

  • Fight zombies, skeletons, demons, and more in your quest to save the princess.
  • Explore 24 levels with hidden locations, collectibles, and challenges to overcome.
  • Enjoy a single-player adventure reminiscing classic games of the 80s and 90s.

Defeat your enemies using different weapons, find secret levels, and activate special tiles to unlock shortcuts or reach previously inaccessible areas. Reach checkpoints to respawn closer to the end of the level and ultimately Save the Princess.
